titleStmt.title: A lamentable list of certaine hidious, frightfull, and prodigious signes, which have bin seene in the aire, earth, and waters, at severall times for these 18. yeares last past, to this present: that is to say, anno. 1618. untill this instant. anno. 1638. in Germany, and other kingdomes and provinces adjacent; which ought to be so many severall warnings to our kingdome, as to the said empire. To the tune of aime not to high.

publicationStmt.publisher: [by J. Oakes?] for Tho. Lambert, and are to be sold at the sign ... ,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "You who would be inform'd of forraine newes,".
Printer's name and date of publication from STC.
In two parts, printed side by side.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
